channel.title: Game Crashes at Unforseen Consequences Elevator
channel.description: Hey, my game crashes every time I try to use the elevator in Unforseen Consequences. It is after the large broken bridge. Right before the elevator is a room with quite a few explosives and 2 Houndeyes spawn in there. When I use the Elevator button, the doors close and the Loading icon appears. The game crashes before it finishes loading every time. Here are a couple pics of the elevator that crashes: ![](upload://fJ428yHnPIuA92w4QYzsRElXofT.jpeg) ![](upload://ia8457tZelLDBoAUv8SSHHg3X8t.jpeg) I attatched my mdmp file. hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_16T18_31_26C0.mdmp (110 KB)

item.title: Game Crashes at Unforseen Consequences Elevator
item.dc:creator: nathangonmad
item.description:
Its not for this exact crash, but on my play through I got a few crashes here and there. Turning of mat_bumpmap in console fixed the issue for me, don’t know if it’ll make any difference for you though, worth a try though.

Read full topic
item.source: Game Crashes at Unforseen Consequences Elevator

item.title: Game Crashes at Unforseen Consequences Elevator
item.dc:creator: Jirue
item.description:
Hey, my game crashes every time I try to use the elevator in Unforseen Consequences. It is after the large broken bridge. Right before the elevator is a room with quite a few explosives and 2 Houndeyes spawn in there.

When I use the Elevator button, the doors close and the Loading icon appears. The game crashes before it finishes loading every time.

Here are a couple pics of the elevator that crashes:

1024×638 107 KB

1024×636 124 KB

I attatched my mdmp file.
hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_16T18_31_26C0.mdmp (110 KB)

Read full topic
